changelog:
- 1. Primary Request and Intent:
-    - Organize templates into task-based subfolders (gathering/, heal/, help/, bounty/, rewards/, common/, zombie/)
-    - Remove loose images from root templates folder after organization
-    - Make "Restore Size" in GUI restore windows to 1280x720 (original size) instead of grid size
-    - Create Zombie Hunt task for levels 30-40 with stamina management (50→100→500)
-    - Create Rally (Hivemind) task for levels 4-7 with 4-minute rally wait
-    - Fix healing task detection issues - add retry logic, fallback templates, and Plan B detection
